title: Sarah Paulson on American Horror Story & Steven Spielberg
author: Jimmy Kimmel Live
comment: I love this actress. Not just her acting skills but also because she's also very fun to watch on interviews. She's so interesting and funny.
i love how the audience cheers and loses their minds when she says "Cordelia" like....mood sjdkskd
"she's dead now... spoiler alert" gotta love sarah paulson
“SHELBY she wasn’t my favorite” same Queen same 😂😭
description:
Sarah talks about all the characters she has played on 'American Horror Story,' making her directorial debut and the unexpected advice she received from Steven Spielberg.
